title: FF! Doc | LdapFindMemberPipe
listItems: Required Support a current transaction; create a new one if none exists.
Supports Support a current transaction; execute non-transactionally if none exists.
Mandatory Support a current transaction; throw an exception if no current transaction exists.
RequiresNew Create a new transaction, suspending the current transaction if one exists.
NotSupported Do not support a current transaction; rather always execute non-transactionally.
Never Do not support a current transaction; throw an exception if a current transaction exists.

LdapFindGroupMembershipsPipe
LdapFindMemberPipe
Pipes
Pipe that checks if a specified dn exists as 'member' in another specified dn in LDAP.
See also
Github - LdapFindMemberPipe Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.ldap.LdapFindMemberPipe
Syntax
Copy
<LdapFindMemberPipe name=""/>
Attributes
Required
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
name	text	-
The functional name of this pipe. It can be referenced by the path attribute of a PipeForward.
Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
dnSearchIn	text	-
The dn of the group to search in when the parameter dnSearchIn is not set
dnFind	text	-
The dn of the member to search for when the parameter dnFind is not set
recursiveSearch	boolean	true
When true, the member attribute is also searched in all the found members
AbstractLdapQueryPipe
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
ldapProviderURL	text	-
Url to context
